UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Anti-Staphy Peptides Rationally Designed from Cry10Aa Bacterial Protein
Literature.Author: Rios TB, Maximiano MR, Fernandes FC, Amorim GC, Porto WF, Buccini DF, Marín VN, Feitosa GC, Freitas CDP, Barra JB, Alonso A, Grossi de Sá MF, Lião LM, Franco OL

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=128-256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MBC=256µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=64µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MIC=16µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 8739(MBC=64µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=128µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae ATCC 49141(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=64µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=256µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=64µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(30-40% Cytotoxicity=128µg/ml)
